name: Total Soccer Academy - Atlanta
short_description:
Gwinnett Soccer Club - Total Soccer Academy Club, Grayson, GA, Small group soccer training for serious players aspiring for professional or collegiate scholarship opportunities.
I founded Total Soccer Academy on the premise that there exists a need for a systematic plan of action, to guide, support, and continue the development of soccer at the youth levels. I view soccer as a part of the continuum of the holistic development of young boys and girls. Hence, the attitude, perseverance, application, tenacity, discipline and commitment that will bring success in soccer are the very qualities that will bring success in players’ academic pursuits. Soccer therefore, from my perspective must complement scholastic endeavors and the players should be the ultimate winner.
summary: Atlanta Soccer - Total Soccer Academy, Atlanta, GA
